Title: Provides for the elimination of tolls on the New York state thruway for vehicles transporting veterans to and from veteran's administration hospitals and other veteran's healthcare facilities
Summary: Provides for the elimination of tolls on the New York state thruway for vehicles transporting veterans to and from veteran's administration hospitals and other veteran's healthcare facilities.
LawCode: Amd ยง354, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the elimination of tolls for certain vehicles on the New York state thruway
